strings.name: SET
strings.description: Sets the value of a key

strings.name: SETNX
strings.description: Sets the value of a key only if it does not already exist

strings.name: GET
strings.description: Gets the value of a key

strings.name: MGET
strings.description: Gets the values of multiple keys

strings.name: INCR
strings.description: Increments the integer value of a key

strings.name: INCRBY
strings.description: Increments the integer value of a key by a given amount

strings.name: INCRBYFLOAT
strings.description: Increments the float value of a key by a given amount

strings.name: APPEND
strings.description: Appends a value to a key

strings.name: STRLEN
strings.description: Gets the length of the value stored in a key

lists.name: LPUSH
lists.description: Prepend one or more values to a list

lists.name: RPUSH
lists.description: Append one or more values to a list

lists.name: LPOP
lists.description: Removes and returns the first element of a list

lists.name: RPOP
lists.description: Removes and returns the last element of a list

lists.name: LRANGE
lists.description: Gets a range of elements from a list

lists.name: LLEN
lists.description: Gets the length of a list

lists.name: LINSERT
lists.description: Inserts an element before or after another element in a list

sets.name: SADD
sets.description: Adds one or more members to a set

sets.name: SREM
sets.description: Removes one or more members from a set

sets.name: SMEMBERS
sets.description: Gets all the members in a set

sets.name: SISMEMBER
sets.description: Checks if a member exists in a set

sets.name: SINTER
sets.description: Returns the intersection of multiple sets

sets.name: SUNION
sets.description: Returns the union of multiple sets

sets.name: SDIFF
sets.description: Returns the difference between multiple sets

sets.name: SMOVE
sets.description: Moves a member from one set to another

sets.name: SCARD
sets.description: Gets the number of members in a set

hashes.name: HSET
hashes.description: Sets the value of a field in a hash

hashes.name: HGET
hashes.description: Gets the value of a field in a hash

hashes.name: HGETALL
hashes.description: Gets all fields and values in a hash

hashes.name: HDEL
hashes.description: Deletes one or more fields from a hash

hashes.name: HINCRBY
hashes.description: Increments the integer value of a field in a hash

hashes.name: HINCRBYFLOAT
hashes.description: Increments the float value of a field in a hash

hashes.name: HKEYS
hashes.description: Gets all the fields in a hash

hashes.name: HVALS
hashes.description: Gets all the values in a hash

sortedSets.name: ZADD
sortedSets.description: Adds one or more members to a sorted set, or updates their score

sortedSets.name: ZRANGE
sortedSets.description: Gets a range of members in a sorted set

sortedSets.name: ZREVRANGE
sortedSets.description: Gets a range of members in a sorted set, ordered from highest to lowest score

sortedSets.name: ZREM
sortedSets.description: Removes one or more members from a sorted set

sortedSets.name: ZRANK
sortedSets.description: Gets the rank of a member in a sorted set

sortedSets.name: ZSCORE
sortedSets.description: Gets the score of a member in a sorted set

sortedSets.name: ZINCRBY
sortedSets.description: Increments the score of a member in a sorted set

sortedSets.name: ZCARD
sortedSets.description: Gets the number of members in a sorted set

hyperloglogs.name: PFCOUNT
hyperloglogs.description: Returns the approximated cardinality of elements in a HyperLogLog

transactions.name: MULTI
transactions.description: Marks the start of a transaction block

transactions.name: EXEC
transactions.description: Executes all commands issued after MULTI

transactions.name: DISCARD
transactions.description: Discard all commands issued after MULTI

transactions.name: WATCH
transactions.description: Watch one or more keys for modifications

pubsub.name: PUBLISH
pubsub.description: Posts a message to a channel

pubsub.name: SUBSCRIBE
pubsub.description: Subscribes to one or more channels

pubsub.name: UNSUBSCRIBE
pubsub.description: Unsubscribes from one or more channels

keyspace.name: EXPIRE
keyspace.description: Sets an expiration time for a key

keyspace.name: TTL
keyspace.description: Gets the time to live of a key

keyspace.name: PERSIST
keyspace.description: Removes the expiration time from a key
